title: Kim Zolciak's daughter Ariana, 18, recycles her mother's Playboy Bunny costume for Halloween party
text:
Good genes go a long way.

And Ariana Biermann proved she was very much her mother's daughter as she slipped into Kim Zolciak-Biermann's old Playboy Bunny Halloween costume for a festive affair over the weekend.

The 18-year-old reality star flaunted her impeccable physique in the strapless black number as she posed with a pal at a party in Atlanta, Georgia, much to her mom's delight.

All grown up: Ariana Biermann proved she was very much her mother's daughter as she slipped into Kim Zolciak-Biermann's old Playboy Bunny Halloween costume for a festive affair over the weekend

Ariana's tanned and toned figure was on display in the tiny number which laced up along her thighs and featured a plush white tail.

She added a pair of fishnet nylons to her sexy ensemble, and wore sky-high black stilettos to mirror the infamous bunny.

The Don't Be Tardy star wore white silk cuffs along her wrists and the signature pair of ears on top of her platinum blonde hair.

Like mother, like daughter: The 18-year-old reality star flaunted her impeccable physique in the strapless black number as she posed with a pal at a party in Atlanta, Georgia, much to her mom's delight

Classic: Ariana's tanned and toned figure was on display in the tiny number which laced up along her thighs and featured a plush white tail

Kim, 41, wore the costume for Halloween last year, with husband Kroy dressed up as Hugh Hefner.

'My baby @arianabiermann wore my Playboy Bunny costume this weekend,' she shared to her followers. 'I love it!'

Ariana rose to reality fame on her family's Bravo show, a spin-off from Kim's days on the Real Housewives of Atlanta.

Mother knows best: Kim, 41, wore the costume for Halloween last year, with husband Kroy dressed up as Hugh Hefner

Best: The Don't Be Tardy star wore white silk cuffs along her wrists and the signature pair of ears on top of her platinum blonde hair

Kim was an original member of RHOA for five seasons (beginning in 2008) before pursuing her own endeavors.

After asking, believing and receiving, she married former professional football player Kroy Biermann on Nov. 11, 2011.

Kroy and Kim have four children together: Kroy Jagger, Kash Kade, Kaia Rose and Kane Ren, and he adopted Ariana and her sister Brielle in 2013.
description: The 18-year-old reality star flaunted her impeccable physique in the strapless black number as she posed with a pal at a party in Atlanta, Georgia, much to her mom's delight.
